> Does anyone have some hints, what to do, to have the correct order.
> Perhaps extending TestRunner or something like that?

if you _really_ need an ordered TestSuite, you can check out junit-addons
<http://junit-addons.sf.net>.  It contains the OrderedTestSuite class that
executes the tests in an alphabetical order.
